text: aur (ai rasool) tum aad ko bhaee (hood) ko yaad karo jab unhonne apanee qaum ko (sarazameen) ahaqaaph mein daraaya aur unake pahale aur unake baad bhee bahut se daraane vaale paigambar guzar chuke the (aur hood ne apanee qaum se kaha) ki khuda ke siva kisee kee ibaadat na karo kyonki tumhaare baare mein ek bade sakht din ke azaab se darata hoon
